alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Southeast Carter; Southeast Greene; Southeast Monroe; Unicoi (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 29 at 6:50AM CST until January 29 at 8:00AM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, areas of snow will continue through mid morning. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches are possible. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 5 to 10 below zero. * WHERE...Southeast Carter, Unicoi, Southeast Greene, Johnson and Southeast Monroe Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 9 AM EST this morning. For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 1 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The blustery winds combined with fresh snow cover will cause blowing and drifting of the snow.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Prepare for possible power outages. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Johnson; Southeast Carter; Southeast Greene; Southeast Monroe; Unicoi
